title: Progressive Radio News Hour
content:
Stjepan Mestrovic is a Professor of Sociology at Texas A&M University and author of “The Good Soldier on Trial: A... <!--more--> Sociological Study of Misconduct by the US Military Pertaining to Operation Iron Triangle, Iraq.
” Wrongfully convicted were low ranking soldiers to absolve commanders, Pentagon brass, and top Bush administration officials.
Attorney Paul Bergrin was also bogusly charged, sits in jail, and faces trial for seeking justice.
Major world and national issues will be discussed.
